text.en: so Musa struck him with his fist
cried out to him for help
(is the) matter with both of you
And We caused to follow them
text.ru: И сделали Мы так, что следует за ними

text.en: Then We caused to swallow up
He would have caused it to swallow us
text.ru: то непременно заставил бы Он поглотить

text.en: He would have caused it to swallow us
